items.title: Battle Bay
items.description: Collaborated with Rovio Entertainment as Lead Engineer, overseeing both client and server-side development of the game. Led a team of four, coordinating with game designers, 3D artists, concept artists, QA and Data Analysts to deliver timely releases. Managed release processes, implemented and maintained a CI/CD pipeline for efficient build delivery, and administered AWS EC2 instances. Providing support through bug fixes and the development of new features, ensuring high-quality updates and smooth user experiences. items.title: Bloody Lawman
items.description: Myself and 2 of my friends created this game over a weekend, it was first game jam and what a game jam it was. We learnt a lot in this one. In BLOODY LAWMAN You can infect other humans who will infect other humans to spread the infection among peoples of the city. But beware !! The cops have arrived to protect the last of humanity. You will have to be sneaky around them.

items.title: Saving Astral
items.description: As a freelancer, I worked on this project for few months. As a lead, my job was to work on complex systems like Localization and Procedural Asteroid generation, keeping track on the engineering coordinating with designers to bring the ideas to life. Eventually the owner decided to close the project, so this never got released!
